---
title: "Class 24: Introduction to Difference-in-Differences"
date: 2025-04-14
---

The goal of Part 2 of this module is to introduce the difference-in-differences identification strategy and begin to implement this strategy with simulated data.


## Objectives

- Describe the basics of panel data and fixed effects
- Describe the DD research design

## Activities 

- Implement DD using simple averages and in a regression context
